title: Draft > Team Builder. Agree? Disagree?
body:
Team Builder: Why? 
I just think that having a practice version of Ranked was much better than this Team Builder.
Sure it's a good concept, but if it's one or the other, then why don't we have Normal Draft pick? 
I'd just like to be able to practice counter picking and banning etc rather than deal with team builder. 
Why not get rid of norms instead? Team builder is practically norms with a better matchmaking system anyway. But that's not really my point, I just want draft pick back.

What do you think? 
Do you miss draft pick?

replies.body:
my idea is 


Fu.ck blind pick queue(remove it)
Bring draft back, and let TB stay


but, i ain't no rioter
Team Builder is fine, blind should be removed and draft should come back, blind pick causes nothing but problems.

If we can, just get us all modes.

However it's not possible at this point then I would actually agree to sacrifice blind to trade Draft for it.

And keep the TB.

Draft and TB have their advantages. Where Draft can prepare you for the pick style of ranked, TB can give you the practice you need in particular roles without the stress of champ select. Any way you look at it though both are superior to blind pick, not considering queue times.

I just had a 20min que time in team builder for team to be disabandoned THIS IS REDICULOUS get rid of blind pick and keep team builder and bring back draft ques would flow so much better

Blind pick is just trolls anyway

I get a team in TB maybe 50% of the time before I get fed up with waiting, today I waited 30 minutes before a team was made... Just now I tried to create a team and it takes too long. 

In saying that I prefer TB over blind as it seems that the kiddies don't play TB at all so the quality of game is better in my general experience if you can ever get one going...

IMO the only real options that are fun is ranked and aram.
